# Accounting & Audit â€“ Reporting Boundaries

## Owned Outputs
The Accounting & Audit domain owns:
- General ledger views
- Financial statements
- Audit reports
- Regulatory financial disclosures

## Input Dependencies
- Transactional events from upstream domains
- Reference data for classification

## Forbidden Responsibilities
This domain must not:
- Initiate financial transactions
- Perform payment execution
- Apply risk scoring or fraud detection
- Modify operational source systems
